hero.headline: OpenAI Sandbox
hero.subheading: Learn OpenAI by experimenting with real examples, comprehensive guides, and hands-on tutorials.
hero.description: Explore the power of artificial intelligence through practical examples, API integrations, and step-by-step learning paths designed for developers and AI enthusiasts.

cards.title: Quickstart
cards.description: Get up and running with OpenAI APIs in minutes. Learn the basics with simple, practical examples.

cards.title: Model Inference
cards.description: Master the art of prompting and interacting with OpenAI models for optimal performance.

cards.title: Model Customization
cards.description: Fine-tune and customize models for your specific use cases and domain requirements.

cards.title: Model Evaluation
cards.description: Learn comprehensive techniques to measure and improve model performance and safety.

cards.title: Agentic AI
cards.description: Build autonomous AI agents that can reason, plan, and take action independently.

cards.title: Advanced Topics
cards.description: Explore cutting-edge research, experimental techniques, and emerging AI technologies.

features.title: Why Choose OpenAI Sandbox?
features.subtitle: Everything you need to master OpenAI development

items.title: Hands-on Learning
items.description: Learn by doing with interactive examples and real code you can run immediately.

items.title: Production Ready
items.description: All examples follow industry best practices and are ready for production use.

items.title: Always Updated
items.description: Stay current with the latest OpenAI features and API changes.

footer.description: OpenAI Sandbox - Learn AI development through practical examples and comprehensive guides.
